Description: CAR T cells are transforming the approach to refractory B cell malignancies but have not yet demonstrated consistent activity against solid tumors.  Differential response rates across disease settings has been attributed to impaired T cell fitness, limited immune cell trafficking and a dearth of compelling targets in solid tumors versus B cell malignancies. This session will review current approaches underway to overcome these barriers, review results from clinical trials and provide participants with a balanced view of the basis for optimism in this field while also highlighting the challenges that remain.
Location: New Orleans Theater B, Convention Center
SearchResultBody: SY26. CAR T cells for Solid Tumors: Bullish or Bearish?

Title: CAR T cells for Solid Tumors: Bullish or Bearish?
